original_text: And David built there an altar unto the Lord, and offered burnt offerings and peace offerings. So the Lord was intreated for the land, and the plague was stayed from Israel.
korean_text: 그 곳에서 여호와를 위하여 제단을 쌓고 번제와 화목제를 드렸더니 이에 여호와께서 그 땅을 위한 기도를 들으시매 이스라엘에게 내리는 재앙이 그쳤더라

sentences.original_text: And David built there an altar unto the Lord,
and offered burnt offerings and peace offerings.
So the Lord was intreated for the land,
sentences.korean_translation: 그리하여 주께서 땅을 위해 기도를 들어주시니,

sentences.original_text: and the plague was stayed from Israel.
